dmca.title: [ABUSE] abuse of information and copywrite infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 27, 2006 7:59 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] abuse of information and copywrite infringement

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Thursday, January 26,
2006 at
9:47:45 AM and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to
your team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] abuse of information and copywrite infringement

MESSAGE BODY:
To whom it may concern.  
   
  A web site you are hosting at URL:
http://www.tonysmovies.com/video/torture.shtml is using my information and a
link to my copywrited photographic image on their porn website.  I would
like this copywrite infringement dealt with and my personal information
removed from this website.  The image representing "ladynoelani76" is myself
and I have given no permission for this site to use my information or link a
false image to my true, copywrited image.
   
   This individual is violating his TOS with ThePlanet.com by violating
copywrited photographs, cross posting and internet slander.  
   
  I require a response to my letter in three days or I will contact legal
council with this situation.  You may also contact me via telephone at 815
272 0454
  
Miss. Michelle Becker

                
---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
 With a free 1 GB, there's more in store with Yahoo! Mail.


RFC822 HEADERS:
